design_philosophy.description: A sophisticated booking experience that feels like a high-end magazine. High contrast, warm neutrals, and elegant serif typography. Avoids the clinical 'medical' look of standard booking apps.

buttons.primary: bg-brand-charcoal text-white hover:bg-black rounded-none px-8 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all hover:scale-[1.02]
buttons.secondary: border border-brand-charcoal text-brand-charcoal hover:bg-brand-charcoal hover:text-white rounded-none px-8 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all

cards.service_card: bg-white border border-brand-sand/30 p-8 hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-brand-sand/20 transition-all duration-500 group cursor-pointer

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b border-brand-charcoal/20 focus:border-brand-charcoal rounded-none px-0 py-4 text-lg focus:ring-0 placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 transition-colors

navigation.header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-brand-sand/20

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.stagger_children: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Do not use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Use Playfair Display.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle grain textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use Lenis for smooth scrolling on marketing pages.
Forms should feel like a conversation, not an interrogation. Use step-by-step wizards.
Dark colors look good when used independently. Avoid dark gradients.
instructions_to_main_agent:
1. Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion' immediately.
2. Add the font imports to index.css.
3. Configure tailwind.config.js with the brand colors.
4. Build the Layout.jsx with the sticky header and Lenis scroll.
5. Implement the Booking Wizard with 'framer-motion' for transitions between steps.
